comment: Takes points off for the smallest things even though HIS instructions are not clear enough

Worst professor everr do not take!! He grades very harshly and does not answer questions at all just tells you to read the instructions as if you have not already. He acts nice in person and says if you have questions to email/ask but does not follow through

He was polite but often condescending especially to the females. He changed assignments and due dates without warning and would often forget what he told us. Not very helpful with assignments but not much effort was necessary to pass this class. I felt cheated out of class time b/c of his cancellations to go out of the country for personal trips.
I took him at Mercer in Henry county. That is where he slithered to. Should not be teaching!
Greet Professor. You have to take him to appreciate

I dreaded going to this class every Monday and Wednesday. He is an arrogant, snide little man who has a very poor image of women. There must be SOMEONE else KSU can employee in his stead. Avoid his section if it can be helped.

Worst teacher I have ever had! He tries to come off as a concerned teacher who wants to help - NOT! Disrespectful to students, tests unclear with more than one choice of answers that mean same thing, promised extra credit that he never gives, anyone late?...whole class gets bulleted with 15 min of tantrums for tardiness that isn't even mandatory!

do not take this class with this professor!! i could not understand anything he was saying, tested on material not covered, tests made no sense, and he was extremely boring! you could tell he was very knowledgeable, but not good at teaching it.
It was rather difficult to understand him. All you really need to do is read the book. I slept in class often and still got an A. The labs were a pain!
If every teacher was the practical and understanding, everyone would stay in college.
Worst teacher i have ever had

He doesn't explain things well and the tests are really hard. He does give extra credit if you turn in the labs though which is good. He expects the class to finish his sentences all the time and if you don't he gets mad. It drives me crazy. He tries to be nice and helpful but just isn't.

When you think you know what he's talking about, he'll say something different and confuse everything. Easy class if you have a crystal ball to figure out what the test questions really mean. Good part, no need to turn in labs.

It is not the accent that bothers me, but the thing that I am confused, his explanations are not very good, lots of words and yet no clarity. Ir bothers me the phrase "Am I wasting ur time?" If u are wasting my time, I would not have come. Often, he does so, but if u want a good grade, better attend class and take his notes.
Unclear, no matter how much you study and attend class the tests are still unclear, confusing, and unfair.
Easy A.......If you study.
He is hard to understand language wise. His tests come directly from the book. show up and read every page in detail from the book.

Dnt get scared over this ranting bout accent, afterall, who doesn't have one? A lil bit hard 2 understand but if u can look past his accent, u r fine! He's passionate bout the class & actually wants you to learn something 4rm it. Tests can be a bit challanging & unclear but studying hard will see you thru! Take him & go 2 class wit an "OPEN HEART"!

You couldn't pay me to take him again.  Nothing is clear and his tests are stupid.  He doesn't speak proper english and his tests are not written in proper english.  I am taking the final tomorrow and I haven't learned anything yet.  Never gonna take him again.

DO NOT TAKE! Dr. Vokhiwa is very difficult to understand. He is also not very helpful when something needs to be made up. He called many people out during class for things that should not matter in a college atmosphere. He really does not seem to care about the student, although that is all he says he does care about. I do not recommend Dr. Vokhiwa

This man is very difficult!! His tests are unclear, and is VERY rude to his students who ask questions during class. If you do get him to answer a question it is very unclear! NEVER responds to emails! DO NOT TAKE HIM IF YOU CAN HELP IT.
DO NOT TAKE! He is very difficult. His test are inclear. He likes to put lots of % and numbers on his test. He is very specific.

Don't take him if you can help it. He is a nice guy and trys a little too hard to be "hip" but is very hard to understand. His tests always end up with errors and if you catch one while reviewing he takes the blame but you don't get the point for his errors. Avoid...

Tests questions and confusing and unclear, does not grade very fairly but gives extra credit to make up for it. If you work your but off you might be lucky enough to get a B but I wouldnt take this teacher if you can avoid it.

As long as you understand what he is saying it's not too bad. You have quizzes over the labs. He likes to go off on tangents if someone does something he doesn't like! If you go to class, take notes, read the assignments, and study your labs you should do fine.

very confusing. when you actually can make out what he's trying to say, you are so behind you have to catch yourself up. the labs are confusing and he doesn't help. he talks while giving the test...its hard to concentrate! he rambles on about his hometown and how he ate grasshoppers.

If you can understand what he says, it is not so bad. His tests, however, are confusing. It is hard to understand what he is asking, and often there is more than one answer that could be correct. However, he does give extra credit. Read the book, you should do fair.
hard to understand at first. but he really wants to see people do well in his class so he tries to be helpful.

Overall unclear in his lectures.  Likes to tell life stories which can be very boring.  Half of his test were good easy tests if you studied and the other half were rediculous and seemed like there were pulled out of thin air.

Was not helpful outside of class, to the point of RUDE!!  Was very unclear about things he wanted when it came to assignments, and then would not accept them.  I Did find his class pretty easy, but his attitude was so bad...I won't be taking him for 1102.  I can't do that for another semester.
Hard to understand but easy tests. I highly recommend studying up on Malawi(his home country in Africa) to surprise him!

Loved Him! Dr. Vokhiwa made this class interesting as well as infromative and insightful. The information I learned in this class are things we should all know. He made a subject that I was not all that interested in (thanks to Dr. Ware) fun and very interesting. I highly recommend him. Take him if you can.
Easiest A Possible!  His accent is hard to understand, but you dont even have to go to class if you just read the book and follow his guidelines!  Take him and Good luck!
Great teacher and very helpful. He might be hard to understand but will go the extra mile to help any student. Gives extra credit when he feels neccessary.
Except for his accent he isa wonderful, funny teacher. He is always willing to help out his students!

This teacher is soooo funny! He always has a positive attitude and is smiling. He gives answers to everyone on the test if people are having problems with particular questions. He is so cool. He has been, by far, my favorite professor at KSU. This class is extremely easy and he is very helpful. He says that his goal is to give everyone an 'A' but you must speak with him and ask for his help. He will not help if it is close to the end of the semester. VERY EASY 'A'.
He is a good teacher.  It is an easy "A".  He is sometimes hard to understand with his accent.  His test are relatively easy and he gives you a studyguide.

Terrible.  Not clear. Needed help with things, he said he would help, and then didn't help at all. Class is big, he doesn't work with you well. Hard to understand (accent) and treats a lower level course like a 3000-4000 level course. ridiculously hard tests.
He is a really nice guy. He is willing to help you. His tests are not too difficult. I would reccommend him.

He is a wonderful teacher that I highly recommend! I do not know what everyone is talking about. I loved him as a teacher.  It is an EASY 'A' and if you talk to him at the beginning of the semester he will help you out the whole semester. He even gives answers to the test on the test days! Take him!

Here is some helpful advice... know these things 1)SUSTAINIBILTY, 2)how to paddle a boat, 3)Do not shame the devil, and 4)blame it on the rain... this will all make sense to you when you take him... but really he is pretty easy... just his accent can throw you off a bit
The most unclear teacher I have ever had.  Has a ton of experience and is very smart but lacks the ability to communicate his know-how to the class.  Tons of busy work.

If you really want to learn about environmental science, he knows it ALL. But if you have little interest beyond getting the credit hours the class is boring and he can be confusing at times.  Read the book, read your notes, and you have an A or B.

Great experience, but has some trouble conveying ideas. Be polite!!! Don't try and do things (essays) the way they should be done, rather do them the exact way he tells you to. Tests are fair if you listen to his lecture and do things his way.
Run away! Run fast! His syllabus is a joke. He rarely clarifies assignments, due dates, etc. Lectures are dull and have nothing to do with the tests.
